text: @realDonaldTrump @AlexAzar President Trump’s erratic handling of the coronavirus outbreak, worsening economy and a cascade of ominous public and private polling have the GOP nervous that they are at risk of losing the presidency and the Senate if Trump does not put the nation on a radically improved course
